SideTabItem.value: Encoding utf8_no_bom = new System.Text.UTF8Encoding(false); StreamWriter writer_out = new StreamWriter(Console.OpenStandardOutput(),utf8_no_bom);

Console.InputEncoding = Encoding.UTF8; //--can not do that unless you set project properties first to output-type "console application". Or you'll get IO-error invalid-stream. Console.OutputEncoding = Encoding.UTF8; //--can not do that unless you set project properties first to output-type "console application". Or you'll get IO-error invalid-stream.
